ComicInfo.Summary:
The back story of Jordan Hale is revealed as are his reasons for going after the Brown House Bishops. Meanwhile, with Rian having been near impossible to control, Cody calls a rare meeting to sort out the situation. Brown House's top dog, Thorne, gets some information that might just expose Hale's crew of assassins.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Jamal Igle & Simon Gough | 2 | C | Cover C | Drew Edward Johnson & Wes Hartman | 3 | D | Cover D | Tommy Patterson & Oracle | 4 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | 5 | Digital | Digital Cover | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 6 | Note: The digital edition (11/27/2013) for this edition was released a week before the print edition (12/4/2013).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 18:21:06. [CVDB435241]
